content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community,Livecasino.io is back again with another Promo, this time for 1 mBTC free bet for Evolution Crazy Time!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo#29 will work like this:Reward1 mBTC in free bets on Evolution Crazy Time game! How?Opt-in by sending PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #24 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 depositWager at least 10 mBTC on any games at Livecasino.ioPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the time of this post to Sunday 28th August, 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the reward The reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 29th August, 17:00 GMTAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still apply, including multi-account restrictionsWe hope you enjoy!Fl√°vio from livecasino.io team
